text: Sir Graham Vick (30 December 1953 - 17 July 2021) was an English opera director. He was known for being the director of the Birmingham Opera Company. Vick was born in Birkenhead, England. Vick was appointed Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in the 2009 Birthday Honours and knighted in the 2021 New Year Honours for services to music and the regions. Vick died on 17 July 2021 in London from COVID-19, aged 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Birmingham Opera Company biography Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English entertainers Category:People from Birmingham Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in London
title: Graham Vick
